Text: I la chʼe-iko e̩wñ kpai ewo e̩wñ, amo̩maye, eku-wñ aku me̩ ku ma ko̩takada-wñ rʼume̩ n;
todu ame̩ onugo chema o̩bie̩ o̩bie̩ kakini, Alu kʼoji awa odu abe̩le̩ o̩jo̩ Ondu awa.
E̩gba ku ma jʼakakini, Ure̩do̩, ane̩ bo̩ du me̩; e̩gba le̩ achigili ukpabie̩ awa bʼuma ma alu kʼefu amu onobule̩ kʼi defu, i la anʼugbo du ku ma afo̩wo̩ tane̩ n.
I muda chʼame̩, amo̩maye, me̩ jʼef e̩chubi tak o̩jo̩ kʼa ka-i ki mu me̩ dab oji n.
Todu o̩chaka-me̩ chʼamo̩ma ugane̩ kpʼamo̩ma o̩ro̩ka. A chʼabo odu kpʼabo e̩chubi n.
Todule̩ a ki we olu ele̩ alu kʼabo kibo̩ ale̩ le̩; a ki muda gwe̩ke̩ adide, eju-wa ki chene̩.
Todu abo ku ma alolu, odu ma ale̩, abo kʼo̩te̩ mu ma, odu oñ i amu ma.
Ama abu kʼa chʼabo o̩ro̩ka eju-wa ki chene̩, kʼa kʼe̩wñ ube̩do̩ma e-e̩do̩ ekono kpʼufe̩do̩ nyʼo̩la, ukata ebije-wa kʼi chʼukibeno e-ujadu.
Todu O̩jo̩ ko wa jo̩ ñw uwe̩do̩ n, chai todu kʼa ki che kʼujadu ki mud e-wa ogbolo lef Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti,
kʼi leku todu wa, todu ki dagba kʼa gwe̩ke̩ adide, dagba a lolu kʼa ki bʼowñ deju.
Lef e-le̩ me̩ ki dʼugbe̩do̩ ñw omune̩, ku me̩ ne omune̩ nyo̩gba, alu ku me̩ jʼache le̩.
Oñ a bi me̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki fʼabo ku ma jʼachʼakanya ef ume̩ ku ma la tʼo̩gba ñwu me̩ ef Ondu, ku ma la ako̩ me̩ ibe ma.
Ama le̩ ki wʼume̩ eju nana tabale ef ufe̩do̩ todu uko̩lo̩-ma. Ure̩do̩ ki dʼagbagba-me̩.
A la dʼugbe̩do̩ ñwu me̩, amo̩maye, me̩ ki ko̩ abo ku ma chʼo̩kpo̩ ibe, me̩ nanyʼabo kʼe̩do̩-ma kpabie̩ e̩do̩, gwo̩nyʼame̩ne̩gbo dago, me̩ je̩do̩ ugbo e̩ne̩ du.
Me̩ nago tode̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ʼka adabi dʼe̩bie̩ne̩ koji e̩bie̩ne̩ ñw one̩. Me̩ muda nabʼe̩nyo̩ kpe̩re̩ kpʼomune̩, kpʼe̩ne̩ du ge̩, e̩gba du.
Me̩ nayo̩ e̩gba du.
Me̩ ki chadua o̩ko̩ko̩lo̩.
Me̩ fʼugwa-wñ gwa ef e̩wñ du, todu e̩wñ ki dʼO̩jo̩ e̩do̩ efu Kraisti Jisus ñwu me̩ le̩ de̩.
Me̩ ki kpʼAfu lu n.
Me̩ ki chʼe̩de̩te̩ ache̩ eka n.
Me̩ ki ñwa e̩wñ du go, ku me̩ mʼe-o̩me̩me̩le̩ ne̩ gaga.
Me̩ nahimama e̩wñ bibi alu du kʼi chaka de̩ eju.
Oñ O̩jo̩ e-ure̩do̩ onugo ki che ku me̩ fo̩ ogbolo, kʼo̩gbo̩-me̩ du, tʼafu, tʼonugo, tʼaño̩la kʼi do̩mo̩ kʼi we enʼuchalu ef ewa Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti.
E̩ne̩ kʼi ado̩ me̩ chʼachubi one̩, i la ñʼache.
Amo̩maye, me̩ ki chadua todu wa.
Me̩ ki nʼalu ekalu kiafo̩ fʼamo̩maye chaka gwa.
Ondu nago̩ nʼume̩ ku me̩ fʼo̩kalatu o̩takada-i che ñw amo̩maye kiafo̩ chaka.
Ufe̩de̩nyo̩ Ondu-wa Jisus Kraisti ki dʼugbo me̩.
